info.name: Cattle Identification System API
info.description: Complete API collection for Cattle Identification System with User, Regional Admin, M_Admin, and Super Admin workflows

request.description: Standard login with mobile number and password
Get currently logged in user details
Get user's cattle and transfer statistics
Register new cattle with 14 images (3 muzzle, 3 face, 3 left, 3 right, 1 full body left, 1 full body right)

query.description: Filter by status: active, archive, transit

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific cattle
Get cattle images by category (muzzle, face, left, right, fullBodyLeft, fullBodyRight)
Get user's transfer requests (sent and received)
Get details of a transfer request
Create M_Admin for identification (Super Admin only)
Get cattle pending regional admin review
Get cattle details for regional review
Forward cattle to M_Admin for identification
Get cattle details for M_Admin verification
Get all users (Regional admin: only their region)
Generate verification report with turnaround tracking
Get report statistics (JSON response, no file)
Cleanup old report files (Super Admin only)
